ModMetaData.name: Rick's Portal Gun - Smart Teleporter AI
ModMetaData.author: Portal Gun Team
ModMetaData.description: Enable intelligent portal-based teleportation for pawns when traversing inefficient or long paths, simulating Rick's portal gun. When a pawn begins a task, it evaluates travel cost. If the cost exceeds a threshold, a green portal pair spawns, and the pawn teleports through it to reach the target more efficiently.
